Uses of Interface
org.drip.util.common.Validatable

  • Packages that use Validatable 
    Package Description
    org.drip.param.product  
    org.drip.product.creator  

    • Uses of Validatable in org.drip.param.product

      Classes in org.drip.param.product that implement Validatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BondCFTerminationEvent
      This class contains the current "liveness" state of the bond, and, if inactive, how it entered that state.
      class  BondCouponParams
      Contains the coupon type, schedule, and the coupon amount for the bond.
      class  BondCurrencyParams
      This class contains the bond's trade, the coupon, and the redemption currencies.
      class  BondFixedPeriodGenerationParams
      This is the place-holder for the generic bond’s period generation parameters.
      class  BondFloaterParams
      Contains the bond's floating rate parameters.
      class  BondIdentifierParams
      This class contains the bond's identifier parameters - ISIN, CUSIP, ID, and ticker.
      class  BondIRValuationParams
      Contains the bond IR Valuation Parameters.
      class  BondNotionalParams
      This class contains the notional schedule and the amount.
      class  BondPeriodGenerationParams
      Class the generates the bond coupon periods from flexible inputs
      class  BondTSYParams
      Class contains bond treasury benchmark parameters - the treasury benchmark set, and the names of the treasury and the EDF IR curves.
      class  CompCRValParams
      CompCRValParams contains the credit related valuation parameters - use default pay lag, use curve or the component recovery, component recovery, credit curve name, and whether there is accrual on default

    • Uses of Validatable in org.drip.product.creator

      Classes in org.drip.product.creator that implement Validatable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BondRefDataBuilder
      This class contains the entire set of static parameters for the bond product.
